data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 91,534 believers in the state of Petén.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Petén, Guatemala

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Petén.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Petén.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Petén, Guatemala.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 91,534 believers in Petén, Guatemala a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Petén that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Petén, Guatemala that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

location.name: Petén
